remarks: Cancellation of a nonzero factor on the left in an equation.  One-way deduction form of ~ mulcand .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
mulcanad.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulcanad.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulcanad.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcanad.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
mulcanad.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( C x. A ) = ( C x. B ) ) $.
mulcanad $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
